publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4036 Roseanna Cunningham: The Draft Community Right to Buy (Definition Of Excluded Land) (Scotland) Order 2009—That the Rural Affairs and Environment Committee recommends that the the draft Community Right to Buy (Definition Of Excluded Land) (Scotland) Order 2009 be approved. Supported by: Richard Lochhead*

S3M-4036 Roseanna Cunningham: The Draft Community Right to Buy (Definition of Excluded Land) (Scotland) Order 2009—That the Rural Affairs and Environment Committee recommends that the the draft Community Right to Buy (Definition of Excluded Land) (Scotland) Order 2009 be approved. Supported by: Richard Lochhead
